overview_description.description: UniFAHS is a leader in the use of phage technology, committed to the sustainable production of safe food from farm to table, advocating for the idea of one health in its whole and actively addressing the worldwide problem of antibiotic resistance (AMR).

properties.growth_insight_description: UniFAHS may be growing as it has successfully raised USD 1.4 million in seed funding, which is a significant financial indicator of investor confidence and capital infusion for expansion. The funds are earmarked to scale their bacteriophage technology, which is aimed at enhancing sustainable agriculture, indicating a strategic move to increase their operational capacity. Additionally, the company's inclusion in a news article alongside other firms securing funding suggests a positive trend in financial backing and business development.

about_short_description.short_description: UniFAHS is a Special Phage-Based Solutions for Sustainability and Food, Animal, and Human Safety.

product.name: PhagePromptTM
product.description: Phage-based solutions targeting foodborne pathogens like Salmonella, E. coli, Listeria, and Vibrio to ensure food safety from farm to fork.

product.name: Biocontrol Agent
product.description: Encapsulated bacteriophage used as a biocontrol agent to combat antimicrobial resistance and ensure the safety and quality of food.

product.name: Global Partnership in Phage
product.description: Collaborative efforts aimed at advancing phage technology applications globally to combat antimicrobial resistance.
